column4: Somone here has a clue about universe and so? how easy is it to package sth for ubuntu's universe?.
I mean if I did a simple piece of software and want to provide it
read the packaging links from wiki/MOTU

thanks. I'm reading lots about this but it's a headache on all the things you have to do.. so far I've successfully built a .deb with dpkg-buildpackage but all these further things are scaring me off..
